metadata.title: CVE-2020-7043 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in openfortivpn 1.11.0 when used with OpenSSLbefore 1.0.2. tunnel.c mishandles certificate validation because hostnamecomparisons do not consider '\0' characters, as demonstrated by agood.example.com\x00evil.example.com attack.

criterions.comment: openfortivpn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
